name: Vsevolod
summary:
Welcome to Vsevolod, the awesome game of battle for the control of the Galaxy and the world domination!

You, Vsevolod the Knight, are destined to unite all tribes, liberate the long-suffering peoples in the farthest corners of space, and bring the peace and prosperity to the Galaxy. But first you have to destroy all your enemies. You can destroy them by taking their life energy by bumping into them, but remember, this takes your life energy, too. You can also bump them into each other or into the walls. You can also bump them into other objects, like stars, asteroids, and various pieces of garbage floating in space. Good luck with your quest and remember - the fate of the Galaxy lies with you!
